rows.title: Ground & gratitude

transcript.eng:
Close your eyes.

Take a moment to feel the ground under your feet.
Think of something you feel grateful for.
Focus on your breath.
Breathe in and out.

In and out.

rows.transcript:

text_1.eng: Take a moment to check in with yourself.

quiz_1_feedback_1.eng: Wonderful, I am so happy things are going well.

quiz_1_feedback_2.eng: Some days will have their challenges. That is okay. You are on the right path!

quiz_1_feedback_3.eng: Sorry that things are difficult now. It is completely normal to struggle sometimes. Remember that you are not alone!

You have done it! You have built lots of important parenting skills.

This is a huge achievement. It shows such care for your family.

media_title.eng: Let's celebrate our journey together and all your achievements!

media_transcript.eng:
Greetings everyone.

Todayâ€™s topic is celebration and next steps.

It has been amazing, it has been wonderful having you on this journey. Today we are celebrating our journey together.

Today we are celebrating all the learnings that we have learnt throughout this time together.

Now, let's think of the next steps. What could be the next steps after this? Maybe we are planning to continue all the learnings that we have learnt here. We don't know, we are hoping that for the next steps, the skills, the learnings will continue. We wish you a pleasant, happy, family time. 

Thank you.

rows.media_title: Let's celebrate our journey together and all your achievements!
rows.media_transcript:
Greetings everyone.

Todayâ€™s topic is celebration and next steps.

It has been amazing, it has been wonderful having you on this journey. Today we are celebrating our journey together.

Today we are celebrating all the learnings that we have learnt throughout this time together.

Now, let's think of the next steps. What could be the next steps after this? Maybe we are planning to continue all the learnings that we have learnt here. We don't know, we are hoping that for the next steps, the skills, the learnings will continue. We wish you a pleasant, happy, family time. 

Thank you.

text_1_facilitator.eng: You and your family have learnt so much. Let's think back and see what has changed since learning all these parenting skills

media_title.eng: You've done an amazing job. Tap play to reflect on how far you've come

media_transcript.eng:
Close your eyes and relax.

Think of your family life before you started your journey with this app.

Think back on skills you learned:

Self-care
One-on-one time
Praise
Positive instructions
Managing stress
Family budgeting
Rules
Calm consequences
Problem solving
Teen safety
Dealing with crisis
Reflect on the journey â€“ how was it for you to:

Share ideas and experiences
Reflect on and learn from the stories
Practice skills with your teen
Did anything change for you and your family?

What do you need to continue to use skills?

text_1_facilitator.eng: Here are a few tips to help you continue learning and supporting your community!

text_2.eng: **Here are some ideas on how you can support each other:**

section_1_text.eng: Keep meeting regularly to give each other parenting support.

section_2_text.eng: Be â€˜parenting buddiesâ€™ to call when you are upset or do not know what to do.

section_3_text.eng: Text each other every week to share what you have done well.

section_4_text.eng: Share @global.app_name and help other families start their journey.

rows.text_2: **Here are some ideas on how you can support each other:**
rows.section_1_text: Keep meeting regularly to give each other parenting support.

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Well done!

We are so proud of you. You have shown strength, courage, and love for your family. Parents are amazing. You are amazing.

media_title.eng: This song is for parents everywhere. Listen, dance and celebrate yourself!

media_transcript.eng:
When everything feels like it is falling apart And you can't help but raise your voice When all the frustrations are beginning to start Remember that you have a choice

Let's slow down Take a few deep breaths Remember all we have to be grateful for Let's slow down Take a few deep breaths Because I really couldn't love you more

You can take pause, you can count to 10 Play a game or do something fun You can phone a friend, someone to confide in Remember you're not the only one

Let's slow down Take a few deep breaths Remember all we have to be grateful for Let's slow down Take a few deep breaths Because I really couldn't love you more

Let's slow down Take a few deep breaths Remember all we have to be grateful for Let's slow down Take a few deep breaths Because I really couldn't love you more Because I really couldn't love you more
